lead_paragraph: The triangle offense, which relies on precise spacing to spread out the defense, was at the core of numerous N.B.A. championships won by the Chicago Bulls and the Los Angeles Lakers under Phil Jackson, who will now try to straighten out the Knicks. So the triangle may be coming to New York, and here is a sampling of how it works.
